trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task that gathers form region information to register or unregister the form regions for Microsoft Office Outlook 2007.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务，该任务收集表单区域信息，以注册或注销 Microsoft Office Outlook 2007 的表单区域。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Set all of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions> properties, and then call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions.Execute%2A> to run this build task.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions>属性，，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions.Execute%2A>运行此生成任务。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Build Engine uses <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks> to build and deploy Office solutions.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Build Engine 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks>生成和部署 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create your own build system by using these classes and the MSBuild XML-based project files.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用这些类并基于 MSBuild XML 项目文件来创建你自己生成系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [MSBuild Reference](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 参考](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置加载项的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示外接程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly must include the extension.
trans-unit.target: 程序集的名称必须包括扩展名。

trans-unit.source: Gathers form region information to register the form regions for application loading, or unregister them to uninstall the form regions.
trans-unit.target: 收集表单区域信息，以注册应用程序加载的表单区域，或注销这些信息以卸载表单区域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form regions are successfully registered or unregistered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功注册或注销表单区域，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions.AssemblyName" /> is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions.AssemblyName" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或空。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> objects that represent the form region names and message classes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示表单区域名称和消息类的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> objects that represent the form region names and message classes.
trans-unit.target: 数组<see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />表示窗体区域名称和邮件类的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem> contains two pieces of data that are referred to by name:
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem>包含将按名称引用的数据的两个部分：

trans-unit.source: `FormRegionName`, which stores the form region name as a string.
trans-unit.target: `FormRegionName`其中将窗体区域名称作为字符串。

trans-unit.source: `MessageClasses`, which is a string array that contains every message class as a separate element.
trans-unit.target: `MessageClasses`这是一个字符串数组，包含每个消息类作为一个单独的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Microsoft Office application for which the form regions are being registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要为其注册表单区域的 Microsoft Office 应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the Microsoft Office application for which the form regions are being registered.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，它表示要为其注册窗体区域的 Microsoft Office 应用程序名称。

trans-unit.source: For Office solutions in Visual Studio, the only valid application is Outlook.
trans-unit.target: 对于 Visual Studio 中的 Office 解决方案，唯一有效的应用程序是 Outlook。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions.Execute" /> will uninstall the form regions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.RegisterFormRegions.Execute" /> 是否将卸载表单区域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the form regions will be unregistered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果窗体区域将注销;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。
